jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
Senior Mobile Developer (Android/iOS)
jobs_results.description:
Senior Mobile Developerin roolista Nitorilla

Mobiilikehityksess√§ t√§rkeimm√§t kehitysalustamme ovat iOS ja Android. Kehit√§mme niin natiivi-sovelluksia Swiftill√§, Objective-C:ll√§ ja Kotlinilla kuin cross-platform ratkaisuja React Nativella. P√§√§set toteuttamaan itse√§si my√∂s uusimmilla tekniikoilla kuten SwiftUI:lla ja Jetpack Composella.

Toimiva perusta on se, mink√§ p√§√§lle laadukas sovellus rakennetaan. Siksi pyrimme aina k√§ytt√§m√§√§n parhaita mahdollisia ja moderneja arkkitehtuuriratkaisuja, kuten reactive programming, unidirectional dataflow, MVVM ja clean architecture. Kehit√§mme laajoja ja pitk√§aikaisia sovelluksia, joten t√§ss√§ roolissa saat vastuuta sovelluksen yll√§pidosta ja laadun kehitt√§misest√§ pitk√§ll√§ aikav√§lill√§.

Mobiiliprojektiemme kesto on usein vuodesta useampaan vuoteen riippuen omista toiveistasi. Useimmissa projekteissa toimit osana asiakkaan kehitystiimi√§, jossa on mukana my√∂s useampi muu kokenut nitorilainen.

‚úÖ Mit√§ tarvitaan mobiilikehitt√§j√§n√§ menestymiseen Nitorilla?
‚Ä¢ Mobiiliprojektimme ovat tyypillisesti haastavia kokonaisuuksia, mik√§ edellytt√§√§ aikasi seuraamista ja ohjelmistokehityksen periaatteiden hyv√§√§ tuntemista. Ymm√§rr√§t esimerkiksi, miksi singleton on pahasta ja miksi dependency injection hyv√§st√§. Asynkroninen ohjelmointi on sinulle tuttua.
‚Ä¢ Usean vuoden kokemusta ohjelmistokehityksest√§ erilaisten palvelujen/tuotteiden parissa, jotta pystyt toimimaan asiakasprojekteissasi lis√§arvoa tuovana asiantuntijana. Asiakkaamme odottavat usein l√§hemm√§s kymment√§ vuotta relevanttia kokemusta.
‚Ä¢ Olet kirjoittanut yksikk√∂testej√§ ja kenties jonkun integraatiotestinkin. Kiinnostus pilviymp√§rist√∂j√§ kohtaan, kuten AWS ja Firebase, katsotaan eduksi.
‚Ä¢ Tunnet alustariippumattomia ohjelmistokehyksi√§, joilla voi toteuttaa sovelluksia eri p√§√§telaitteille sek√§ ymm√§rr√§t ketter√§n laadunvarmistuksen k√§yt√§nt√∂jen merkityksen mobiilikehityksess√§.
‚Ä¢ Arvostamme intohimoista suhtautumista laadukkaan ohjelmakoodin tuottamiseen, testien kirjoittamiseen ja kyky√§ ottaa haltuun uusia varteenotettavia teknologioita.
‚Ä¢ Meille on t√§rke√§√§ kyky tehd√§ t√∂it√§ ketter√§sti tiimin yhteisten p√§√§m√§√§rien saavuttamiseksi asiakasl√§ht√∂isess√§ ymp√§rist√∂ss√§. T√§m√§n vuoksi arvostamme hyvi√§ tiimity√∂taitoja sek√§ konsultatiivista ja asiakasl√§ht√∂ist√§ ajattelutapaa. Sujuvaa suomen ja englannin kielen osaamista

Miksi Nitorille?
Mielekk√§iden projektien ja r√§√§t√§l√∂ityjen ammatillisten kehittymismahdollisuuksien lis√§ksi tarjoamme sinulle henkil√∂st√∂etukokonaisuuden, joka todella tuntuu. Koko Nitor on rakennettu sen mukaan, ett√§ voimme tukea sinun urakehityst√§si sek√§ kest√§v√§√§ ty√∂tahtiasi ja hyvinvointiasi. T√§ss√§ esimerkkej√§ etupaketistamme:
‚Ä¢ Voit k√§ytt√§√§ 10 % ty√∂ajastasi omaan ammatilliseen kehittymiseesi yrityksen tukemana.
‚Ä¢ Haluaisitko osallistua johonkin alasi kiinnostavaan tapahtumaan? Voit k√§ytt√§√§ vuodessa 5 ty√∂p√§iv√§√§ koulutus- tai konferenssimatkoihin miss√§ p√§in maailmaa tahansa.
‚Ä¢ Ty√∂v√§line- ja kotitoimistohankintoihin sinulla on vapaasti k√§ytett√§viss√§si 7100 ‚Ç¨ ‚ÄúRautapankki‚Äù, joka t√§ydentyy joka kuukausi.
‚Ä¢ T√§ydet lomat ty√∂suhteesi alusta asti riippumatta siit√§, mihin aikaan vuodesta aloitat.
‚Ä¢ T√§ydet kulttuuri- ja liikuntaedut, hierontaetu sek√§ ty√∂matka- ja polkupy√∂r√§etu.
‚Ä¢ 500-2000 ‚Ç¨ bonus jokaisesta suorittamastasi sertifikaatista.
‚Ä¢ Todella laaja ty√∂terveyspaketti sek√§ terveysvakuutus, jotka kattavat mm. erikoissairaanhoidon palvelut, hammasl√§√§k√§ripalvelut sek√§ mielenterveyden tuen
‚Ä¢ Yhteis√∂llisyytt√§ vaalimme muun muassa useilla vuosittaisilla yhteisill√§ matkoilla (olemme olleet mm. Pisassa, Berliiniss√§, Wieniss√§, Edinburghissa ja Dubrovnikissa sek√§ pohjoisen hiihtokeskuksissa), sesongin mukaisilla tapahtumilla ja viikoittaisilla yhteisill√§ kokoontumisilla ja aamiaisilla. Tervetuloa vaikkapa juoksuklubiin, viininmaistajaisiin, leffailtoihin, HIIT-treeneihin tai lautapelikerhoon!
‚Ä¢ Toimintatapamme perustuvat luottamukseen, avoimuuteen ja toistemme kunnioittamiseen; jokainen nitorilainen tuo oman lis√§ns√§ yrityksen toimintaan. Arvostamme ja vaalimme erilaisuutta sek√§ sen tuomaa lis√§arvoa asiakkaillemme.

Tulevasta ty√∂nantajastasi

Nitor on vuonna 2007 perustettu digitaalinen insin√∂√∂ritoimisto, jossa ty√∂skentelee noin 300 tulevaisuuden liiketoiminnan rakentajaa. Jokainen nitorilainen on digitaalinen insin√∂√∂ri; pragmaattinen ja ratkaisukeskeinen tiimipelaaja, joka ei tyydy oletuksiin. Meille ominaista ovat todella korkea ammattitaito ja ylpeys niin omasta kuin kollegoidemmekin ty√∂st√§. Ty√∂skentelemme yhdess√§ suurimpien suomalaisten yritysten kanssa ja autamme heit√§ onnistumaan paremman digitaalisen maailman rakentamisessa.

Kasvumme on vahvalla pohjalla: liikevaihtomme on kasvanut jokainen vuosi, vuonna 2023 kasvatimme liikevaihtoamme jo 17. per√§kk√§isen√§ vuotena ylt√§en 40 miljoonan euroon. Olemme j√§lleen vuonna 2023 saaneet Onwayn vertailussa IT-alan parhaan sijan asiakastyytyv√§isyydess√§ kahdettatoista vuotta putkeen, mink√§ lis√§ksi omat ty√∂ntekij√§kyselymme kertovat vuodesta toiseen todella korkeasta tyytyv√§isyydest√§ Nitoriin ty√∂nantajana. Tunnustuksena erinomaisesta ty√∂ntekij√§kokemuksestamme, meid√§t palkittiin vuoden 2023 vetovoimaisimpana ty√∂nantajabr√§ndin√§ Suomessa. Poissaolollaan loistavat keskijohto, mikromanageeraus sek√§ itse√§√§n toistavat ja vaikutukseltaan marginaaliset asiakasprojektit. Nitorilla voit luottaa siihen, ett√§ saat keskitty√§ t√§ysin omaan projektiisi meid√§n pit√§ess√§mme huolen kaikesta muusta.

Nitorilla avoin yrityskulttuuri ja l√§pin√§kyvyys ovat oleellinen osa arkeamme. Yksi t√§rkeimmist√§ arvoistamme on yhteis√∂llisyys. Toimintatapamme perustuvat luottamukseen, avoimuuteen ja toistemme kunnioittamiseen. Jokainen Nitorilainen tuo oman mausteensa yrityksen toimintaan ja yhteis√∂√∂n. Arvostamme ja vaalimme erilaisuutta sek√§ sen tuomaa lis√§arvoa, t√§√§ll√§ ei pakoteta ket√§√§n tiettyyn muottiin.

Kuulostaako lupaavalta? L√§het√§ meille LinkedIn-profiilisi tai CV:si ja jutellaan lis√§√§ siit√§, mit√§ Nitor voisi sinulle mahdollistaa.

Nitorin rekrytointiprosessi

Rekrytointiprosessimme heijastelee arvojamme ‚Äì kyseess√§ on selke√§ ja avoin nelivaiheinen dialogi, jonka aikana p√§√§set tapaamaan v√§hint√§√§n nelj√§ nitorilaista. Tarjoamme sinulle kaiken mahdollisen tiedon, jota tarvitset tehd√§ksesi p√§√§t√∂ksen seuraavasta ty√∂paikastasi.

1. Tutustuminen Nitoriin: Kartoitamme keskeisimm√§t uratoiveesi. People Partnerimme kertoo Nitorista, projekteistamme ja siit√§, milt√§ ty√∂si Nitorilla voisi n√§ytt√§√§.

2. Tekninen haastattelu: Tapaat kaksi mobiilikehitt√§j√§√§mme, joiden kanssa kartoitetaan teknisen osaamisesi vahvuudet ja laajuus. Saat my√∂s ensik√§den tietoa projekteistamme ja Nitorista ty√∂nantajana.

3. Avoimet kysymykset: Tuplatsekkaamme, ett√§ olet saanut vastauksen kaikkiin mahdollisiin kysymyksiisi. Tarkennamme tulevaa rooliasi Nitorilla ja pohjustamme tulevaa ty√∂tarjoustasi.

4. Tarjouksen esittely: Esittelemme tarjouksen joko toimistollamme tai online-tapaamisessa, jolloin voit kysell√§ heti lis√§tietoja tarjoukseen liittyen.

Kuulostaako lupaavalta? Haluatko olla mukana mahdollistamassa koodin ikitakuun, jonka asiakkaillemme annamme? L√§het√§ meille LinkedIn-profiilisi tai CV:si ja jutellaan lis√§√§ siit√§, mit√§ Nitor voisi sinulle mahdollistaa.

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Finland

We‚Äôre now looking for a

Senior Mobile Developer

For our customer, 9Solutions. 9Solutions is the leading provider of real-time locating based safety, communications and smart care solutions from Oulu, Finland. Their mission is to create environments for safe and quality care by providing solutions that enable effective communication, make relevant information easily accessible and free up working hours for meaningful tasks. 9Solutions Oy is a Great Place to Work-certified workplace. Their offices are located in Oulu and in Helsingborg, Sweden. 9Solutions was also selected as one of Finland‚Äôs 40 most innovative companies leveraging AWS services. 9Solutions has an annual revenue of 10M EUR and the company employs over 40 people.

9Solutions is now looking for an experienced and dynamic Senior Mobile Developer to join a team consisting of 5 people. The most important aspect of the job is to produce high-quality, user-friendly code on both iOS and Android with high focus especially on the front-end development.

What does the role mostly consist of:
‚Ä¢ Designing and developing high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms
‚Ä¢ Collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather and refine project requirements
‚Ä¢ Implementing and maintaining clean and efficient code
‚Ä¢ Maintaining and improving the existing stack
‚Ä¢ Creating and optimizing front-end interfaces for an exceptional user experience
‚Ä¢ Staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices

What are we looking for:
‚Ä¢ A curious individual who is interested in digging deeper into the best industry practices and development of personal expertise
‚Ä¢ Strong experience and expertise in Android and iOS app development
‚Ä¢ Previous experience of working with front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
‚Ä¢ Previous experience of working with Java
‚Ä¢ Experience with cross-platform mobile development frameworks (such as React, Native, Flutter)
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with mobile app design principles and UX/UI guidelines
‚Ä¢ Residency in Finland
‚Ä¢ Fluency in both written and spoken English

What are seen as an advantages:
‚Ä¢ Previous experience of working with Kotlin, Swift and/or Objective-C
‚Ä¢ A strong portfolio of mobile app projects and/or previous experience of working with apps available in app stores
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of back-end development and APIs
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and expertise in AWS

What are we offering:
‚Ä¢ An opportunity to contribute in meaningful work within healthcare sector and to make a difference in resolving one of the most significant societal challenges related to the aging population
‚Ä¢ A responsible role in a scale-up company
‚Ä¢ Excellent benefits such as extended healthcare, daily snacks at the office, insurance, sport, culture and wellbeing benefits, possibility for a bike benefit, childcare for a sick child etc.
‚Ä¢ A fixed salary of 5000-6500 EUR per month depending on your experience and expertise
‚Ä¢ Extremely flexible remote working possibilities (location in Oulu is preferred, but you can be anywhere in Finland as long as you are willing to visit the office in Oulu every now and then, at least once every two to three months)

Sounds good? We are looking forward to receiving your application! Apply latest as soon as possible because we will start going through the applications as they come. Please note that we only accept applications through our ATS. If you have any questions regarding the position, feel free to contact ICT DIRECT's consultant Ilpo J√§rvenp√§√§; ilpo.jarvenpaa@ictdirect.io +358 50 548 5651

This offer from "ICT DIRECT" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 72% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior C++ Engineer, Core SDK (iOS)
jobs_results.description:
Mapbox provides the building blocks that enable our customers to push the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible with interactive maps and how people use location technologies in their daily lives. Whether you‚Äôre watching the delivery of your grocery order on Instacart, looking at a gym on ClassPass, sending your snaps on Snapchat, tracking your personal best on Strava, monitoring your gas budget on Metromile, or checking today‚Äôs forecast on The Weather Channel, Mapbox is the location and maps within those apps. We‚Äôre changing how people move by live-mapping the world. We are the developer platform for location.

What We Do

The Core SDK team provides the foundational component that powers Mapbox‚Äôs Search, Navigation, and Maps teams SDK products. The work we do makes a big impact in the lives of millions of our customers and their end-users worldwide. Our scope is broad and ranges from maintaining a middleware component providing foundational functionality to our core engines and mobile SDKs, a client-side implementation of our telemetry platform, and a platform bindings generator that exposes our business logic APIs to mobile platforms like Android, iOS, and others.

What You‚Äôll Do
‚Ä¢ Work with a modern code base, using the best practices of software engineering and tools. You'll also work on establishing platform bindings to all modern mobile platform languages
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with internal teams to ensure best practices for cross-platform API design
‚Ä¢ Seek alignment by proposing new ideas and taking the lead role when necessary
‚Ä¢ Improve the project‚Äôs performance, stability, maintainability, and simplicity
‚Ä¢ Design and implement high-priority features
‚Ä¢ Craft expressive and easy to use APIs for developers using our SDKs
‚Ä¢ Dive deep into the underlying cross-platform implementations that power our frameworks

What We Believe are Important Traits for This Role
‚Ä¢ Proficiency with modern C++ (14 and 17), algorithms and performance optimization.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with iOS native technologies such as Objective-C and Swift.
‚Ä¢ Experience with APIs and knowledge on how cross-platform code is integrated.
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with distributed teams.
‚Ä¢ Desire to build frameworks and developer tools.
‚Ä¢ Passionate to earn and keep customer trust

Helpful experiences that are a plus but not a requirement
‚Ä¢ Experience with native Android mobile development
‚Ä¢ Scripting programming experience (JavaScript, Python, CI scripts)
‚Ä¢ Embedded platforms (Linux embedded, Android Automotive)

What We Value

In addition to our core values, which are not unique to this position and are necessary for Mapbox leaders:
‚Ä¢ We value high performing creative individuals who dig into problems and opportunities.
‚Ä¢ We believe in individuals being their whole selves at work. We commit to this through supportive health care, parental leave, flexibility for the things that come up in life, and innovating on how we think about supporting our people
‚Ä¢ We emphasize an environment of teaching and learning to equip employees with the tools needed to be successful in their function and the company
‚Ä¢ We strongly believe in the value of growing a diverse team and encourage people of all backgrounds, genders, ethnicities, abilities, and sexual orientations to apply

jobs_results.title: Flutter Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Portugal

The role is restricted to those physically located in Europe, while this is a remote position, we cannot consider candidates that are not based in such region. Preference will be given to candidates based in Portugal, Spain or Malta.

We are looking for an enthusiastic Flutter Mobile Developer to help maintain and develop our sports mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ As a Flutter Mobile Developer you are expected to ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢ Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code for Flutter application
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain technical documentation for the applications
‚Ä¢ Identify the causes of the most complex issues and implement practical and efficient technical solutions
‚Ä¢ Implement both backend and front-end features
‚Ä¢ Coordinate with UX/UI designers, developers, and test engineers in an Agile environment
‚Ä¢ Abide by industry and company software development standards
‚Ä¢ Conduct code reviews and give feedback to other developers
‚Ä¢ Understand the big picture and offer insightful advice about technologies and projects
‚Ä¢ Be proactive in identifying and communicating potential risks and issues to the team and stakeholders
‚Ä¢ Participate in sprint planning, estimation, and retrospective meetings
‚Ä¢ Keep up-to-date with the latest mobile app development trends and technologies
‚Ä¢ Work in close partnership with cross-functional teams and management
‚Ä¢ Ensure code quality by writing tests, using SonarQube, etc.
‚Ä¢ Success in this role means...
‚Ä¢ Collaborating towards a team effort to improve the overall user experience of our applications.
‚Ä¢ Developing DRY, clean, maintainable and scalable code that can be comprehended and worked on solely through documentation created.
‚Ä¢ Increasing the performance, scalability and security of our mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ You have acquired proficient communication skills in the English language through team collaboration.

This offer from "Raketech" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 86% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior or Lead Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
Senior or Lead Mobile Developer

Datadrivers Oy is Finland's leading software developer in the logistics and driving education sector, and we are now looking for an experienced Mobile Developer to join our growing team in our Oulu or Tornio office. In this role, your main responsibilities will focus on web frontend development, with opportunities to work on both web and mobile projects. You will contribute to technically challenging projects aimed at improving traffic safety and the quality of vehicle training.

Datadrivers is a software company founded in 1996, known for its customer-oriented development in driver training and logistics applications. As pioneers in the digitalization of the entire industry, we operate as part of CAP-Group, the largest driving education provider in the Nordics. With us, you will be part of a team that develops innovative digital services for the industry.

What we are looking for:
‚Ä¢ At least 5 years of experience in mobile software development, with a strong focus on technologies like TypeScript, JavaScript, and React Native or React.js.
‚Ä¢ Experience in API integration, including working with RESTful API or GraphQL APIs, ensuring seamless communication between the frontend and the backend services.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of mobile-specific performance optimization and debugging tools.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Redux or alternative state management libraries to manage and maintain application state in a scalable and efficient way.
‚Ä¢ Experience with CSS frameworks (e.g., SASS, Tailwind), and a good understanding of responsive design and optimizing web performance.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of publishing apps on App Store and Google Play, and understanding the related guidelines and processes.
‚Ä¢ Experience with Storybook for developing and testing UI components in isolation, ensuring a consistent and scalable design system.
‚Ä¢ Strong familiarity with logging, monitoring tools, and user behavior analysis to track system performance, understand user interactions, and ensure the smooth operation of frontend systems.
‚Ä¢ Good documentation skills to ensure that architecture, frontend components, and workflows are clearly communicated to the team and stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities of the Role:
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain mobile applications, focusing on delivering high-quality user experiences for driver education and road safety applications.
‚Ä¢ Work closely with backend developers, UX/UI designers, and product owners to ensure smooth integration between frontend services and backend systems.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to the architecture and design of the overall system, participating in technology selection and mobile strategy.
‚Ä¢ Work with Storybook to create and manage UI component libraries, ensuring components are reusable, tested and well-documented.
‚Ä¢ Optimize applications for performance, responsiveness, and usability on both iOS and Android platforms.
‚Ä¢ Keep up with the latest trends in mobile development, introducing new tools and techniques to improve the development process.

We expect from you:
‚Ä¢ Proven expertise in frontend development with a modern technology stack.
‚Ä¢ Good communication skills and the ability to work in a team.
‚Ä¢ Good problem-solving abilities and a passion for learning and improving your skills.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in Finnish or English.

We offer you:
‚Ä¢ A permanent position in a dynamic and growing company.
‚Ä¢ The opportunity to work in an impactful industry where your contributions help improve traffic safety and vehicle training.
‚Ä¢ A collaborative and supportive work community where openness and teamwork are valued.
‚Ä¢ Opportunities to further develop your expertise and advance in your career.
‚Ä¢ Involvement in the architecture working group, where you can influence the technology choices and architecture of our ecosystem.
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and comprehensive employee benefits.

If you are an experienced Mobile Developer with a passion for creating innovative digital solutions in a meaningful field, we would love to hear from you! Send your application and CV as soon as possible. Datadrivers Oy is committed to the professional development of its employees and offers the opportunity to work in a forward-thinking organization that invests in new technologies and innovative solutions.

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

This offer from "IDT Corporation" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Developer Advocate
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: United States, EMEA

About us:

RevenueCat makes building, analyzing, and growing mobile subscriptions easy. We launched as part of Y Combinator's summer 2018 batch and today are handling more than $4B of in-app purchases annually across thousands of apps.

We are a mission driven, remote-first company that is building the standard for mobile subscription infrastructure. Top apps like VSCO, Notion, and ClassDojo count on RevenueCat to power their subscriptions at scale.

Our 80 team members (and growing!) are located all over the world, from San Francisco to Madrid to Taipei. We're a close-knit, product-driven team, and we strive to live our core values: Customer Obsession, Always Be Shipping, Own It, and Balance.

The Role

RevenueCat helps apps of all shapes and sizes make more money across mobile, the web, and other platforms like Roku and Amazon. As a result, many different types of users log in to ‚Äì and use ‚Äì RevenueCat on a day-to-day basis. Product managers, support reps, lifecycle marketers, user acquisition specialists, data analysts, executives: The list goes on.

None of those users would make it onto RevenueCat unless a developer implements it first. And for smaller apps, developers are these users: They do the marketing, provide support, interpret the performance data, make pricing and packaging decisions, and more.

We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Developer Advocate to help ensure these developers are successful when using RevenueCat. You‚Äôd join forces with our current Advocate, and guy you might have seen walking around Seoul in the rain, Charlie Chapman. We‚Äôre specifically looking for someone with strong skills in producing written educational content targeted at developers that is technical but engaging. Your work will educate existing RevenueCat users, attract new search traffic, and position RevenueCat as the go-to resource when implementing in-app purchases across platforms.

What you‚Äôll be responsible for

Your primary responsibility will be creating high-quality, developer-focused content focused on monetization and in-app purchases. This includes both scenarios where developers use RevenueCat to solve for these use cases, as well as alternative implementations.

Examples of the type of content we‚Äôd expect you to produce include blogpost with titles like:
‚Ä¢ "Migrating a native subscription app to Flutter: A step by step plan"
‚Ä¢ "Implementing your first subscription with RevenueCat: Disable ads for paid users"
‚Ä¢ "How to detect and highlight the platform of purchase for cross-device subscribers"
‚Ä¢ "Adding a multi-tier subscription to your Expo app"

In addition to writing, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Speak at conferences, webinars, and other events to share insights and represent RevenueCat
‚Ä¢ Record videos and collaborate on webinars to help developers implement and succeed with RevenueCat
‚Ä¢ Work cross-functionally to develop resources that support developers using RevenueCat

Within the first month, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Learn RevenueCat inside and out
‚Ä¢ Familiarize yourself with our developer community and how to engage them
‚Ä¢ Have produced your first pieces of RevenueCat content

Within the first 3 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with Charlie on a joint content strategy playing to both your strengths
‚Ä¢ Independently research and develop content to fill current gaps in our documentation and other educational efforts
‚Ä¢ Repurpose existing content into new formats (e.g., blog posts into videos) to expand our reach

Within the first 6 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Represent RevenueCat at industry conferences and webinars, delivering talks and engaging with developers
‚Ä¢ Support product launches with technical content (written or video)

After 12 months, you‚Äôll have:
‚Ä¢ Become a fixture across the developer community, having become synonymous with RevenueCat and in-app monetization for Android, Flutter, and/or React Native
‚Ä¢ Found new and novel ways to help us engage developers (think Shipaton, App Store Rejection socks, and similar initiatives)

About you

You‚Äôre passionate about teaching and helping developers thrive. You‚Äôre deeply experienced in app development, particularly subscription apps, whether as part of a team or through indie projects (preferably both).

What you‚Äôll need to be successful
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience in app development or developer-focused roles, ideally in a subscription app environment, with a deep understanding of at least one major mobile development platform (Android, Flutter, React Native preferred; iOS a strong alternative) and the ability to learn and write about others
‚Ä¢ Strong independent project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple content initiatives, events, and deadlines across time zones without constant oversight
‚Ä¢ Excellent technical communication skills, capable of translating complex technical concepts into accessible and engaging written, video, and spoken formats for developers
‚Ä¢ A passion for teaching and empowering developers, with the ability to create content that educates and inspires action, including blog posts, tutorials, and videos
‚Ä¢ Proven ability to learn and explain new technologies, with expertise in Android development, Flutter, or React Native preferred (experience with iOS development is a plus if paired with a demonstrated ability to adapt to and write about other platforms)
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in producing content for a developer audience, preferably in a professional capacity as a developer advocate, but we‚Äôd consider exceptional candidates that have written, recorded video, and have spoken at conferences targeted at developers as a hobby or side-project
‚Ä¢ Resourcefulness and adaptability, with a problem-solving mindset to navigate the challenges of engaging a global developer community
‚Ä¢ Outcome-driven approach, ensuring your efforts lead to measurable impacts, such as increased content engagement, developer onboarding, and community growth
‚Ä¢ Comfort with a fully remote, asynchronous work environment, and tools like Notion, Zoom, Slack, and Linear. You‚Äôll need to thrive in an environment that balances collaboration with ample time for focused, deep work

We‚Äôre looking for someone who embodies our team‚Äôs core values of agency and intellectual curiosity: taking initiative, solving problems, and continually learning to better serve our diverse developer audience. Regular travel may occasionally be required for conferences, events, or team gatherings.

What we offer:
‚Ä¢ $212,000 USD salary, regardless of location
‚Ä¢ Competitive equity in a fast-growing, Series C startup backed by top-tier investors, including Y Combinator
‚Ä¢ 10-year window to exercise vested equity options
‚Ä¢ Fully remote and flexible work environment
‚Ä¢ 4-5 weeks of suggested time off annually for mental, physical, and emotional recharge
‚Ä¢ $2,000 USD for workspace setup and $1,000 USD annual stipend for continuous learning

Curious about the interview process? Discover more in our blog post about how we hire and learn tips to help you succeed.

This offer from "RevenueCat" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 90% flex score.

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Cross-Platform Developer (Firebase)
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: EMEA

About us:

Talent has no borders. Proxify's mission is to connect top developers around the world with opportunities they deserve. So, it doesn't matter where you are; we are here to help you fast-track your independent career in the right direction. üôÇ

Since our launch, Proxify's developers have successfully worked with 1200+ happy clients to build their products and growth features. 3500+ talented developers trust Proxify and its network to fulfil their dreams and objectives.

Proxify is shaped by a global network of supportive, talented developers interested in remote full-time jobs. Our Glassdoor (4.5/5) and Trustpilot (4.8/5) ratings reflect the trust developers place in us and our commitment to our members' success.

The Role:

We are looking for a Senior Mobile Cross-platform Developer with strong proficiency with Firebase for one of our clients. You are a perfect candidate if you are growth-oriented, you love what you do, and you enjoy working on new ideas to develop exciting products.

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ Minimum of 5 years of experience in mobile application development with a strong portfolio of released applications.
‚Ä¢ Extensive experience with Firebase services and integrations in mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in mobile development frameworks and languages such as Flutter, React Native, Swift, Kotlin, and Java.
‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of testing frameworks and debugging tools for mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using Flutter, React Native, or native languages (Swift, Kotlin).
‚Ä¢ Implement and manage Firebase services such as Authentication, Firestore, Realtime Database, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Crashlytics to enhance mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on reusability and best practices. Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing to ensure application stability and performance.
‚Ä¢ Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in mobile applications and optimise for maximum performance and user experience.

What Proxify offers
‚Ä¢ Career-accelerating positions at cutting-edge companies
‚Ä¢ Discover exclusive long-term remote engagements at the world's most interesting product companies.
‚Ä¢ Hand-picked opportunities, just for you
‚Ä¢ Skip the typical recruitment roadblocks and biases with personally matched engagements.
‚Ä¢ Fast-track your independent developer career
‚Ä¢ Start small and gain more freedom to take on new engagements as you build your independent developer career.
‚Ä¢ A recruitment process that values your time
‚Ä¢ Only one hiring process with the possibility of several positions, without any additional tests.

This offer from "Proxify" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 77% flex score.
